metadata.name: Network Reconnaissance Activity
metadata.comment: Detects a set of suspicious network related commands often used in recon stages

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nslookup')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('_ldap._tcp.dc._msdcs.')))

output.summary: Detects a set of suspicious network related commands often used in recon stages

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment Reference: https://thedfirreport.com/2022/02/07/qbot-likes-to-move-it-move-it/
